messages.message:
Hi all, for anyone who is facing issues with python in macOS BigSur for the local environment. Here are a few things I found -
• pyenv install error - https://github.com/pyenv/pyenv/issues/1737#issuecomment-731672292 use this command and replace 3.8.0 → 3.7.3
• _bz2 import error -  
```brew install zlib bzip2

# Add the following to your ~/.zshrc
# For pyenv to build
export LDFLAGS="-L/usr/local/opt/zlib/lib -L/usr/local/opt/bzip2/lib"
export CPPFLAGS="-I/usr/local/opt/zlib/include -I/usr/local/opt/bzip2/include"

# Then the install worked
pyenv install 3.7.3 # use the above link for installing this might not work.```
